abstract: The Metropolitan Opera’s new production of Don Giovanni pairs a star theater director, Michael Grandage, with a conductor making an unexpected appearance, Fabio Luisi.
snippet: The Metropolitan Opera’s new production of “Don Giovanni” pairs a star theater director, Michael Grandage, with a conductor making an unexpected appearance, Fabio Luisi.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Opera’s new production of “Don Giovanni” pairs a star theater director, Michael Grandage, with a conductor making an unexpected appearance, Fabio Luisi.

headline.main: ‘Giovanni’ as Snapshot of a New Met
headline.print_headline: ‘Giovanni’ As Snapshot Of a New Met
headline.seo: Old-Fashioned Approach to Met’s New ‘Don Giovanni’
